ItemTooltip.FeralClaws:
[c/ffac75:+12% Melee speed]
Enables [c/a2badb:Autoswing] for [c/ffac75:Melee weapons] and [c/8dd6d6:Whip weapons]
ItemTooltip.WhiteString:
[c/ffac75:+2 blocks yoyo range] bonus
[c/ffac75:+25% yoyo range] bonus
ItemTooltip.BlackCounterweight:
Release a [c/ffac75:Counterweight] on [c/ffac75:hit] for [c/ffac75:100%] of your held yoyo's damage
While active, the Counterweight will orbit at [c/a2badb:8 blocks] from your position
ItemTooltip.YoYoGlove:
Release a [c/ffac75:duplicate Yoyo] on [c/ffac75:hit] for [c/ffac75:100%] of your held yoyo's damage
The duplicate yoyo will orbit the main yoyo while it's still in flight
Once your main yoyo's flight duration is over, the duplicate yoyo will become your main yoyo
All [c/ffac75:Counterweights] will release a [c/ffac75:duplicate counterweight]
